content: Hello! How can I assist you today?

请求回答时出现错误，错误内容为:
Error code: 400 - {'error': {'message': "This model's maximum context length is 4096 tokens. However, you requested 4208 tokens (208 in the messages, 4000 in the completion). Please reduce the length of the messages or completion.", 'type': 'invalid_request_error', 'param': 'messages', 'code': 'context_length_exceeded'}}
